metadata.description: Deployment, scaling, monitoring, CI/CD, and cloud-native application patterns

training_samples.title: Docker Best Practices
training_samples.code_snippet:
# Multi-stage Dockerfile
FROM python:3.9-slim as builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --user -r requirements.txt

FROM python:3.9-slim
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=builder /root/.local /root/.local
COPY . .
ENV PATH=/root/.local/bin:$PATH
USER nobody
CMD ["python", "app.py"]
